critical_issues: Minor calibration concern: claim_audit C03 labels the joint evidence as "strong"; the report supports that atmosphere-bearing models fit better (L31, L43) but still emphasizes substantial degeneracies and incomplete constraint of composition/pressure (L37, L46-L53). "Moderate-to-strong" would be slightly more conservative. This does not rise to a contradiction or fabrication.
value.summary: Across all four JSON outputs, the content is consistent with the report: it correctly describes the JWST/MIRI phase-curve design (L14-L16), the core comparison between airless vs atmosphere-bearing scenarios (L20-L23, L35), reproduces the quantitative findings without inventing new numbers (L27-L32), and includes the main caveats about retrieval assumptions, systematics, and weak night-side constraints (L46-L51). Line references used are valid and point to the reported statements/metrics. The 결과
